chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The JUnitPlugin allows users to run JUnit tests from jEdit.

chapter.title: The JUnit window
chapter.para: Plugins>JUnit>JUnit displays the JUnit window. This window is floating by default, but can be made to dock into the view in the Docking pane of the Global Options dialog box.

listitem.para: Progress bar is now displayed at all times.
Plugin fails more gracefully when a NoClassDefFoundError is encountered while running a test. Thanks to Peter Wilkins for the debugging help.
